Text:
Yes!!!

Thank you once more!!! Can't wait to watch it now :)
Big big thanks from Norway for your torrents this year footy!
Wooo!! Tnanks a million dude.
thanks for a great season from Canada, footy! Lots of love
How long for SKY my friend, much better then BBC imo.. Cant wait to watch this race !

Can't wait because I couldn't watch it live unfortunately. Footy please tell me you're uploading the Sky version as well???

And also, a good moment to greatly thank you for the whole year, your contribution has been priceless, for all the quick quality uploads, we are indebted to you. You really are the best and I hope we see your healthy torrents next season, so there would again be someone to always count on during the weekend. :) big thanks!
why BBC for last race? no SKY? anything is great obviously, and always appreciated... but its nice to have some consistency in coverage. especially for the seasons closer. SKY coverage would be nice.
That was fast! Thanks a lot :)
Thank you!
you have been such a savior this season mate. Appreciate all your efforts. Will be looking forward to your uploads next year. Thanks again.
I'm downloading this just to seed but still hoping for Sky, any word on that, footy, coming?
i actually got used to sky, martin brundle rocks. Will you upload a sky version soon footy? Thanks for this one by the way :D

Thank you very much Footy!
Been waiting and no other way to watch here.
Thanks for all your races! Wish you would have separated the intro and live portion. The race is all I care about.
Thanks Footy for all the great work in a great season. We F1 fans in the states salute you. Forza Ferrari!
I agree Sky does a much better job of coverage. BBC sucks.

Patience is a virtue.

Sky SD : http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7859565

Thanks footy - you are and have been great all season and I wish to echo others by saying a really big thank you for all your time and effort. We F1 fanatics who cannot watch F1 without your help, wish you well and hope to see you next season. Cheers!
Thanks a lot footy! You are the man!
I just registered on TPB to thank you,footy..I live outside the UK and I enjoy the BBC coverage very much. Thanks for the upload all season long. You rock!!!

YOU GUYS FUCKING SUCK AT SEEDING!!!

I've been downloading all day long with a peak at 400kbps (100kpbs avg) I'm not going to be able to see the end of this epic season until tomorrow because of you leachy fuckers...

What an amazing race! And what a fantastic F1 season this was! I want to thank you for all those races you uploaded. I don't have tv so without people like you I wouldn't be able to watch F1 races. Thanks a lot, see you next year I hope :)
Is it possible for you to upload the F1 Forum for this race please???  Thanks a lot for you work all year.

Hey Guys and hi footy, you been doing a great job, i appreciate that.
I would like to ask if you are planing to upload the whole season in one package in frame rate 50fps ?

Thanks
for footy +1 even before starting it.. :)

Many thanks again.
could u also upload the Sky HD?
thanks for the torrents this season, top quality stuff.. cya in march :)

Thanks footy for all your efforts throughout this season. You're my personal hero for 2012. Forget about CNN's heroes. You've made me happier this year than anyone else. And i'm not lying. Looking forward to the 2013 season.

You are a true asset to TPB, Footy. Thank you very much for all of your effort in uploading quality content. As for next season, we'll cross that road when we get there, and if we're all so lucky to witness it, I know I won't be the only person on here thanking you.

Long Live Footy!!

Dont know if you read this, footy....

Thanks for the HD upload! I asked you a few days ago to upload HD b4 everything else. And you did.
Thats awesome! Rly like to thank you again! Hope, i could enjoy youre F1 torrents in 2013 again!

All the best to you!

Nice work, many thx for all your effort..

has ANYONE recorded & up loaded the entire sky broadcast in 720p?

I haven't found the pre race & post race in 720p as of yet.

The BBC broadcast signed off not too long after the podium ceremonies and all that extra coverage on Sky isn't there on the BBC.
